name: finalLayoutAttributesForDisappearingDecorationElement(ofKind:at:)
desc: Retrieves the final layout information for a decoration view that is about to be removed from the collection view.
declaration:
func finalLayoutAttributesForDisappearingDecorationElement(ofKind elementKind: String, 
                                                        at decorationIndexPath: IndexPath) -> UICollectionViewLayoutAttributes?
